title: A Antibiotics, Prescription Drugs or Vaccine Detox Online Course + 2 Hour Consult (USA ONLY)
cleaned_text: Description A Antibiotics, Prescription Drugs or Vaccine Detox Online Course + 2 Hour Consult (USA ONLY) For a single antibiotic or combination of antibiotics and/or prescription drugs and/or a single vaccine or combination of vaccines given at any age and/or for a single or combination of antibiotics given at any age. All children's vaccinations are detoxed as a group in the same detox cycle. - Completion and review of a detailed [BRIEF MEDICAL HISTORY](https://homeopathicremediesonline.com/product/consultation-fee-homeopathic-care-medical-history-review/)by the [Homeopathic Practitioner](https://homeopathicremediesonline.com/homeopathic-practitioner/)to qualify for this program for $99.95 is required to be accepted. - The Antibiotic, Prescription Drugs or Vaccines Detox Course to learn how to use homeopathic methods is available for infants, children and adults with vaccine injuries or adverse reactions to any combination of antibiotics, prescription drugs or vaccines, given in any combination at any time in the past. - Homeopathic based detox methods are effective in helping the body to naturally reduce leaky gut from antibiotics, antidote past drugs use and remove injected vaccine toxins. - After the course is completed, the fee includes a 2 hour Skype consultation to customize Detox program, per client. - This fee does not include the required $450 monthly supervision fee per month. - This fee does not include the required the homeopathic remedies or the recommended hair testing and/or any nutritional supplements. - Program fees are non-refundable once paid. Homeopathic and nutritional products have not been evaluated by the FDA and are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
